_____ has become one with its forest of drums and continues to lay down beats that shake all of Galar.
Gigantamax energy has caused _____’s stump to grow into a drum set that resembles a forest.
The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.
By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
